item.title: Bollywood's $140M+ Horror Franchise Unveils MCU-Style Release Dates For 8 Sequels & Spinoffs
item.description: A Bollywood horror franchise that has earned more than $140 million announces 8 more movies, including a sequel to a record-breaking smash hit.

item.title: Young Haymitch In The Hunger Games' New Movie Will Be The Exact Opposite Of Snow In Ballad Of Songbirds & Snakes
item.description: The Hunger Games' Sunrise on the Reaping will portray Haymitch in a different way than it did with Snow in the franchise's 2023 prequel.

item.title: Inception Cast & Character Guide
item.description: Inception has a stacked cast that helps bring Christopher Nolan's original sci-fi epic to life, with exciting characters and powerful performances.
